class_libraries.library:
<class name="PR2LaserScanFootprintFilterNew" type="pr2_laser_filters::PR2LaserScanFootprintFilterNew" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a median filter which filters points out of a laser scan which are inside the inscribed radius.

<class name="PR2PointCloudFootprintFilterNew" type="pr2_laser_filters::PR2PointCloudFootprintFilterNew" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Remove points from the pointcloud inside the robot base.
